China: Ouyang Xiu and the vice chancellor Fan Zhongyan drafted the Qingli Reforms in Song.
England: Edward the Confessor becomes king of all England.
Russia: Rus'-Byzantine War (1043): Yaroslav led an unsuccessful naval raid on Constantinople. According to the peace settlement, Yaroslav's son Vsevolod I married a daughter of the Byzantine emperor Constantine Monomachos.
Spain:
Gonzalo of Sobrarbe and Ribagorza was assassinated by one of his knights.
Ramiro I annexed Sobrarbe and Ribagorza.
